text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include all codes defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-MaterialForm
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-OrderableDrugForm

name: MaterialForm
title: materialForm
description: A value representing the state (solid, liquid, gas) and nature of the material.
